name: Panda Telegraph Uploader
description: Upload Vide, Animation, Pics And Text To Telegraph And Get Direct Link.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter your bot token you can get it from @BotFather.

API_HASH.description: Enter your API HASH you can get it from my.telegram.org

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Enter mongoDb URI you can get it from mongodb.com

MUST_JOIN.description: Enter the username of you channel or group.

LOG_ID.description: Enter id of your log group.

API_ID.description: Enter your API ID here you can get it from my.telegram.org
